participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Rebellious and impulsive, but deep down she craves acceptance and love.
participant_1.background: my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow. i'm here for shoplifting. i'm currently in a juvenile detention center. i will be released in about a month.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and free-spirited, enjoys outdoor activities and has a strong sense of independence.
participant_2.background: i like to ride horses. i have three arabian horses. i like to listen to rock music while working. my father is a farmer.

content.text: Hey! Are you here for shoplifting? Because I am.
